data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Songkhla, Thailand to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Songkhla, Thailand

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 8,356 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Songkhla.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 111 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Songkhla, Thailand.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, cause the 8,356 believers in Songkhla to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Songkhla, Thailand will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Songkhla.
Father, you gave the church of Songkhla, Thailand the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Songkhla, Thailand find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Songkhla
location.cities_list: Hat Yai, Ban Mai, Songkhla, Sadao, Ranot
